title: Ticket #5292: Complain about invalid CCB configuration.
description: Arguably, activating CCB on the central manager is an administrative error. If we decide this is so, HTCondor could reject this configuration on start-up. This could help our users, but it may also change some aspects of our testing work, particularly #5278. Specifically, this may eliminate the need to make shared port and CCB play nice in the same personal condor, albeit at the cost of requiring two separate HTCondor instances to test CCB.
creator: tlmiller
